Package com.api.hub.ai.pojo

Class Goal

java.lang.Object
com.api.hub.ai.pojo.Goal
public class Goal extends Object
Represents a Goal within the AI-Agent Framework.

This POJO models a Goal that the AI agent or environment works towards achieving. Each Goal maintains a collection of Tasks, a status indicating its lifecycle state, a flag to mark if it is a default goal, and a cache of variables relevant to the goal's context.

Responsibilities and Behavior:

  • Holds a queue of Task instances representing work to be done towards this goal.
  • Supports retrieval of the current active task via getTask() (peek of the task queue).
  • Allows adding tasks either at the front or end of the task queue via addTask(Task, boolean).
  • Handles task removal with removeTask(Task), which also calls Task.close() on the task.
  • Manages the goal's status and can be marked completed via close().
  • Maintains a Cache instance to store goal-specific variables, facilitating stateful processing.

Field Summary:

  • goal: A string identifier or description for the goal.
  • defaultGoal: Flag indicating if this is the default goal for the agent or environment.
  • tasks: A deque holding the tasks associated with this goal, ordered for processing.
  • status: Tracks the current lifecycle status of the goal.
  • variables: A cache for storing key-value pairs relevant to this goal's execution context.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getTask

      public Task getTask()
      Retrieves the current active task for this goal without removing it.
      Returns:
      The task at the front of the task queue, or null if no tasks exist.

    • removeTask

      public boolean removeTask(Task task)
      Removes the specified task from this goal's task queue. This also closes the task by updating its status.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the task was successfully removed; false otherwise.

    • close

      public void close()
      Marks this goal as completed by setting the end time and status accordingly.

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task task, boolean addBefore)
      Adds a task to this goal's task queue.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to add.
      addBefore - If true, adds the task at the front (head) of the queue; otherwise, adds it at the end (tail).
